content.value:
Urbana Hostel is located at “Zona Rosa” well known by the nice restaurants and bars, we are 20 minutes away (7 Km) from Downtown and 35 minutes away (15Km) from the “El Dorado” international airport. The property is surrounded by the best restaurants in the city, also bars and spectacular malls.

We have four types of comfortable and bright rooms, plus a seating area, unlimited wifi and a terrace where you can enjoy and share new experiences.

We are designed for all world travelers seeking the best option of accommodation with good rates and comfortable rooms, just a few steps of the Zona Rosa and Zona T. The top location of Bogotá! A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The guest house also offers bike hire and car hire. T Zone is 400 m from Urbana Hostel, while El Campin Coliseum is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Dorado International Airport, 10 km from Urbana Hostel.

description.description: Urbana Hostel is a space for adventurers travelers, located in the most exclusive area of Bogotá, known for the easy access to the “Zona Rosa”, surrounded by nice restaurants, bars and amazing malls. We offer FREE WiFi, Free Colombian Coffee, Kitchen use with their implements, 24 hrs – Front Desk, Bilingual Staff,Security Cameras, Information About the destination, tours and laundry service.
